name: Flux 2 Pro Image Generator and Editor Kie AI
description:
Generates, Edits or Combines image(s) according to text instructions and reference image(s) using the Flux 2 Pro model from Black Forest Labs, via the kie.ai API.
Supports up to 8 local reference images.
Pricing (as of November 2025): ~$0.025 per image at 1K resolution, and ~$0.035 per image at 2K.
Get your API key at https://kie.ai
